Name: Part-of-speech Tag
Description: Part of speech tag of each unigram in the bigram.

Name: Negative Dominator
Description: A list of negative composition words belonging to the dominator semantic class. The dominator dictates the sentiment of the bigram, overriding any conflicting sentiment of the other unigram.

Name: Positive Dominator
Description: A list of positive composition words belonging to the dominator semantic class. The dominator dictates the sentiment of the bigram, overriding any conflicting sentiment of the other unigram.

Name: Positive Propagator
Description: A list of positive composition words belonging to the propagator semantic class. Propagators are sentiment words that, when followed by a word with opposite sentiment, propagate the sentiment of the other word to the bigram level.

Name: Negative Propagator
Description: A list of negative composition words belonging to propagator semantic class. Propagators are sentiment words that, when followed by a word with opposite sentiment, propagate the sentiment of the other word to the bigram level.

Name: Positive Reverser
Description: A list of positive composition words belonging to reverser semantic class.

Name: Negative Reverser
Description: A list of negative composition words belonging to reverser semantic class.

Name: Article Title
Description: The name of the article from which the sentence was extracted.

Name: SectionTitle
Description: The title of the section from which the sentence was extracted.

Name: Article Link
Description: A link to the Wikipedia article from which the sentence was extracted.

Name: Adjectives
Description: A list of words for adjectives.
